titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 75th Anniversary of the Welfare Program of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and the significant impact of the Welfare Program in the United States and throughout the world in helping people in need.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 11/15/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 75th Anniversary of the Welfare Program of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
